resources.string: We get your personal information from the register process. If you want to make changes on your personal information, contact our support.
This includes your username, password, email address, profile information, and any content you have created or shared.

The stock search with exchange selection feature allows users of the stock prediction Android app to search for stock details from Yahoo servers. Users can specify the desired stock exchange using radio buttons, which dynamically modifies the searchinput before fetching the data. The supported stock exchanges are NSE (National Stock Exchange) and BSE (Bombay Stock Exchange).

On the search page of the app, users will find the following elements:
1. Search Bar: A text input field where users can enter the stock symbol or company name they want to search for.
2. Radio Buttons: Three radio buttons representing the available stock exchange options:
			a. NSE: National Stock Exchange
			b. BSE: Bombay Stock Exchange
3. Manual: Allows users to search without specifying any exchange

The section has functionalities as defined below:
1. Retrieving User Input:
		• The app retrieves the user's input from the search bar when the search action is triggered.
2. Stock Exchange Selection:
		• Users can select one of the three available stock exchanges using the radio buttons.
		• The selected stock exchange determines the extension that will be appended to the search input.
3. Modifying Search Input:
		• Based on the selected stock exchange, the app modifies the search input as follows:
				• If NSE is selected, the ".NS" extension is appended to the search input.
				• If BSE is selected, the ".BO" extension is appended to the search input.
				• If Manual is selected, no modification is made to the search input.

Welcome to StockSense, your ultimate companion for discovering and organizing your favorite content! With our innovative homepage, we\'ve designed a seamless experience that puts the power of search and personalization right at your fingertips.

Introducing the powerful search feature of our app, which brings you seamless access to a vast array of financial data and resources.Say goodbye to endless scrolling and wasting time – with StockSense, finding what you want has never been easier. With our intuitive interface, you can effortlessly explore and retrieve information from three distinct sections: NSE, BSE, and Manual search.\n1. NSE: Stay up-to-date with the latest stock market trends and dive into the National Stock Exchange (NSE) section of our app. Instantly search for company stocks, indices, and market data to make informed investment decisions. Our comprehensive database ensures you have access to real-time prices, historical data, and key financial indicators right at your fingertips.Here in this section you have to search only the symbols of the stocks.\n2. BSE: Explore the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) section of our app to delve into a wealth of financial information. From stock prices and market news to company profiles and historical performance, our BSE search feature equips you with the insights you need to navigate the dynamic world of finance. Stay informed and make smarter investment choices.3. Manual: Take control of your search experience with our Manual section.

Create your personalized watchlist with just a tap! Simply add your favourite stocks and you can visit the prediction page just in one tap.Then from the prediction page one can add any particular stock in the watchlist by tapping on watchlist icon. Your watchlist, tailored to your unique stock tastes, all in one place.
